definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

NHK (Nihon Hōsō Kyōkai), Japanese national broadcasting company
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Fang4 song4 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: Kummerfeld is currently a member of the Management Board of FIPP, the International Magazine Association.
sentences.chinese: 目前是国际杂志协会管理委员会委员之一。

sentences.english: Our club has affiliated with a national society.
sentences.chinese: 我们俱乐部已与一个全国性协会合并。

sentences.english: The routine proceeding organ of Guangxi Lawyers Association is the chairmen's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 广西律师协会日常的议事机构是会长办公会。

sentences.english: Even bides such as a quarrel between husband and wife are brought to the peasant association.
sentences.chinese: 连两公婆吵架的小事，也要到农民协会去解决。

sentences.english: Yoshio Aoki is a director of the Japan Space Elevator Association.
sentences.chinese: 青木芳雄是日本太空梯协会主任。

sentences.english: Derek Fisher is the president of the NBA Players' Assn . and he will attend meetings in Phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 小鱼是NBA球员协会的主席，他也将出现在凤凰城。

sentences.english: One of the health talk was hosted by CASSA.
sentences.chinese: 华美老年协会举办的健康讲座之一。

sentences.english: Members of the Farmers' Association descended upon Kentucky for their annual conference.
sentences.chinese: 农民协会成员突然造访肯德基的年会。

sentences.english: In the United States, the certification examinations are prepared and administrated by the American institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA).
sentences.chinese: 在美国，这种考试由美国注册会计师协会负责和实施。

sentences.english: Horses must be crated in suitable containers for humane transportation and in accordance with IATA standard if transported by air.
sentences.chinese: 如用空运，则必须合符国际航空运输协会的标准。

sentences.english: Strictly prohibit landlords and rich peasants from sneaking into the peasant associations and poor peasant leagues.
sentences.chinese: 严禁地主富农分子混入农民协会和贫农团。

sentences.english: However, Norway is a member of the much  smaller European Free Trade Association (EFTA).
sentences.chinese: 同时，挪威也是更小的欧洲自由贸易协会的成员国。

sentences.english: The group urges schools to stop selling full-calorie soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 协会还敦促学校停止出售富含热量的软饮料。

sentences.english: In the counties I visited, the magistrates had to consult the peasant associations on everything in advance.
sentences.chinese: 我走过的几县，知事遇事要先问农民协会。

sentences.english: Just 65 tickets are available for the official tour package backed by the Japan Football Association.
sentences.chinese: 日本足球协会组织的官方旅游团只有65张球票。

sentences.english: China's national vice chairman of the Association of Health-Xiumei said.
sentences.chinese: 中国民族卫生协会副会长云秀梅说。

definition: president of a club, committee etc
